title: Integrated ASIE Model-Based Genetics Education Program [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in life sciences
context.additional_context: A mixed-methods class integrated with social studies curriculum for general citizens, operating in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of Mendelian genetics and apply them to real-life contexts.
Learners can systematically acquire genetic concepts by utilizing the four stages (Activity-Reflection-Exploration-Explanation) of the ASIE model.
Learners can design and implement collaborative inquiry processes for solving genetic problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
